Text: Just a bloody brilliant set of music...nearly all are classics.  I might have added "Love Will Tear Us Apart" by Joy Division, "A Forest" or "Jumping Someone Else's Train" by The Cure, and "TV Party" by Black Flag, and I'd prefer "Sweat in Bullets" to "Love Song"...minor quibbles though...this collection rocks!!!
Thankyou for this , My friend john at work will be very happy now . C H E E R S
